sellerCard.description:
With a rich background spanning over 8 years, I specialize in PHP, WordPress, HTML, CSS, JS, and jQuery. Throughout my journey, I've crafted numerous custom themes and websites, honing my skills to perfection. Whether it's fine-tuning WordPress sites, troubleshooting errors, or tailoring themes to your exact specifications, I've got you covered.

But that's not all â€“ I'm also well-versed in the art of Search Engine Optimization. Need to boost your online presence? I offer a range of services including email marketing and SEO. Let's take your digital footprint to new heights together!

description.content:
Why we should go with the second option when we have the best one. I am talking about Avada which is top rated and the number 1 selling theme in wordpress world.

I can develop and customize any website in avada.

Avada has 30+ demos and the only theme which has the most options to customize.

I can also develop woocommerce website using Avada theme. It has best product options and product page layouts that can be customized as your requirements.

I can create blogs too in avada.

Note: Please Contact me before placing your order.

Thank you :)

reviews.comment:
I've worked with this seller for a few years. Fahad is my go to guy for all website projects.  He speaks fluent English and is a great collaborator. 

Fahad will deliver a great website but you should have your ideas formulated, be ready to zoom chat and clearly offer him direction on your projects.  Then the Magic happens!

Working with Fahad J. on our website development project was an absolute pleasure. His attention to detail was impeccable, and he was incredibly polite and always went above and beyond to meet our needs. Highly recommend! ðŸ‘
Knows his stuff. Is fast and pixel perfect. Will hire again.
Fahad is amazing to work with! He is so professional and does amazing work! Thank you for always being so responsive and a great website designer!
As in previous engagements, Fahad's expertise keeps me coming back for changes.
